description: This file is a PHP source code for a web page that allows users to add a new managed service restriction, including form handling, client-side validation, and AJAX calls to server-side scripts.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the page with the specified title and navigation context, setting up event handlers.

methods.name: updateBlockTimeVisibility
methods.description: Enables or disables the block time selection inputs based on whether the service should always be blocked.
